General.Name: Energiekontor AG
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Energiekontor AG, a project developer, engages in the planning, construction, and operation of wind farms and solar parks in Germany, Portugal, and Great Britain. It owns and operates 139 wind farms and 14 solar parks with a total output of approximately 1.3 gigawatt. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bremen, Germany.

1.Name: Engineer Gunter  Eschen Dipl.-Ing.
1.Title: Head of Project Dev, Head of Const & Svcs for Regions and Member of Mgmt Board
